Class Encoding

    • Method Detail

      • getEncoding

        public static int getEncoding(String data)
        Search for the encoding type of the data.
        Parameters:
        data - The encoded data.
        Returns:
        The integer flags for the encoding, -1 if no encoding is detected.

      • isURLEncoded

        public static boolean isURLEncoded(String data)
        Check for URL encoding.
        Parameters:
        data - The encoded data.
        Returns:
        True if the encoding is URL Encoding, otherwise false.

      • isBase64Encoded

        public static boolean isBase64Encoded(String data)
        Check for Base64 encoding.
        Source for pattern see: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8571501/how-to-check-whether-the-string-is-base64-encoded-or-not
        Parameters:
        data - The encoded data.
        Returns:
        True if the encoding is Base 64 Encoding, otherwise false.

      • isDeflated

        public static boolean isDeflated(byte[] data)
                          throws IOException
        Check for deflated.
        Parameters:
        data - The compressed data.
        Returns:
        True if the encoding is URL Encoding, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the Compression class fails.

      • isJSON

        public static boolean isJSON(String data)
        Check if the the input is JSON.
        Parameters:
        data - The input to check.
        Returns:
        True if data is JSON, false otherwise.

      • isJWT

        public static boolean isJWT(String data)
        Check if the input is a JSON Web Token (JWT)
        Parameters:
        data - The input to check.
        Returns:
        True if data is JSON, false otherwise.
